name: influxdb
tagline: A time-series database optimized for metrics, events, and analytics
description: InfluxDB is a high performance time series database optimized for metrics and events. It supports SQL like queries, retention policies and integrations with dashboards and agents, and can be run self hosted or in managed cloud offerings.

features.title: Time-Series Data Storage
features.description: Stores timestamped data such as metrics events and sensor readings

features.title: High Ingest Throughput
features.description: Accepts frequent writes from monitoring and telemetry systems

features.title: Query Capabilities
features.description: Retrieves and aggregates time-series data using supported query languages

features.title: Retention Policies
features.description: Automatically expires data based on configured retention rules

features.title: Authentication
features.description: Controls access to databases and queries

features.title: Visualization Integration
features.description: Works with dashboards and monitoring tools

features.title: Self-Hosted Database
features.description: Runs the database on your own infrastructure
